response.overview: The film tells the story of Kadesurang (Bella Ranee), a young girl who is a good student in French studying the Department of Archeology. She is very smart but her appearance is not beautiful and stout. At that time, Kadesurang was secretly in love with a guy in the same class but did not dare to confess because he was afraid of his ugly body. One day, when she was going home, she had an accident, her body died but the girl's soul was still wandering in the world then accidentally passing through time and space back into the past into the body. The body of a cruel and brutal lady named Karakade
response.title: Love Destiny
